ast_ivr_option Struct Reference

#include <app.h>

Data Fields

ast_ivr_action action
void * adata
char * option

Detailed Description

Special "options" are:

  • "s" - "start here (one time greeting)"
  • "g" - "greeting/instructions"
  • "t" - "timeout"
  • "h" - "hangup"
  • "i" - "invalid selection"
